definitions.text: the time of day immediately following sunset
examples: they finished before the fall of night

definitions.text: the diffused light from the sky when the sun is below the horizon but its rays are refracted by the atmosphere of the earth
a condition of decline following successes
examples: in the twilight of the empire

definitions.text: lighted by or as if by twilight; -Henry Fielding
examples: The dusky night rides down the sky/And ushers in the morn
the twilight glow of the sky
a boat on a twilit river
